title: Software Developer
description: I design, develop, and deploy responsive mobile and web applications that solve real-world problems for personal, family, and small business use. Collaborating closely with users, I translate feedback into intuitive, feature-rich solutions built with React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Firebase. I also manage post-deployment maintenance—debugging, optimizing performance, and refining functionality to ensure smooth, scalable performance.

title: Software Developer
description: I contributed to the development of a digital portal for a property and casualty insurance company, enhancing internal processes and customer satisfaction. Working in an Agile environment, I participated in Scrum meetings and iterative development cycles, managing deliverables via SharePoint. Using React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL, I designed responsive, scalable solutions that improved system usability, following the product company’s established best practices and standards.

title: Python Tutor
description: I tutored first-year Michigan State University students in foundational Python programming, delivering personalized one-on-one and small group sessions to strengthen coding skills and problem-solving strategies. I created custom examples and exercises covering classes, functions, data structures, and string manipulation, while managing weekly schedules to ensure consistent, engaging, and effective learning experiences.

title: Software Developer
description: I collaborated with a team of four to design and develop Money Moves, a mobile web app for Ally Financial that promotes financial literacy for over 11 million customers. I built responsive, accessible UI/UX components using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, and translated requirements from the senior software team into functional modules like mortgage and interest calculators and interactive course quizzes. I also delivered structured business presentations to stakeholders, showcasing design choices, technical progress, and measurable outcomes.
